title: How to Remove the Scent of Detergent or Fabric Softener from Clothing

steps.headline: Put the clothing out in strong sunlight for several days.
steps.description: This will break down any residues.

steps.headline: Add one cup or more of vinegar in a load of wash to help remove some detergent residue.
Use peroxide-based laundry additives - theoretically these should oxidize residues in the fabric.
Consider odor-removing products - some do work, but beware, many rely on another "cover" scent to mask the odor.

text: Put the clothing out in strong sunlight for several days. This will break down any residues. Add one cup or more of vinegar in a load of wash to help remove some detergent residue.  Use peroxide-based laundry additives - theoretically these should oxidize residues in the fabric.  Consider odor-removing products - some do work, but beware, many rely on another "cover" scent to mask the odor.
